General.Name: Itay Financial A.A Investments Ltd
General.Description: Itay Financial A.A Investments Ltd provides various financial services to public and private companies in Israel. The company operates through Trade in Securities and Derivatives, Distribution of Securities, and Other Activities segments. The Trade in Securities and Derivatives segment is involved in trading and investing in securities and financial assets in the capital market. The Distribution of Securities segment provides consulting services related to issuances, as well as supports companies participating in issuances. The Other Activities segment manages and operates structured financial products. The company was formerly known as PI Financial Ltd. and changed its name to Itay Financial A.A Investments Ltd in May 2011. Itay Financial A.A Investments Ltd was incorporated in 1980 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.
